title: Explained | Ayodhya, Gyanvapi row, and relevance of The Places of Worship Act - India Today
content:
1. Explained | Ayodhya, Gyanvapi row, and relevance of The Places of Worship Act  India Today
  2. Explained: What is the Places of Worship Act, and what are its provisions?  The Indian Express
  3. Gyanvapi case | Parties worry over Varanasi court order  The Hindu
  4. Exclusive: Places of Worship Act must be 'struck down', says Subramanian Swamy amid Gyanvapi Masjid row  Times Now
  5. Explained: The relevance of the Places of Worship Act ahead of the Gyanvapi Mosque case hearing in Supreme Court  Firstpost
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The Places of Worship Act, 1991, was introduced to maintain a status quo over religious places and prevent any communal tension that may arise over the occupancy or rights over any such place. India Today explains the Act's relevance in the ongoing Gyanvapi Masjid controversy
